response.overview: Who said that learning English is hard? With Whistle Tidlalka and Fairy Nezábádka, it's a lot of fun. With engaging stories, songs and rhythmic play of new words and phrases, children quickly learn the basics of English without even knowing they're learning. The proven methodology of Mária Podhradská, an English teacher with ten years of experience, really works. You can once again look forward to the cheerful antics of the popular whistle Tidlalka and her new English friend - a mysterious cupboard named DO-RE-MI! For example, you will find out how to cook a funny soup, clean up toys, practice with firefighter ants, get to know farm animals or experience a real carol Christmas...What adventures will the children have together with Whistle Tidlalka and how will it end in the end? Check out the new episodes of ENGLISH 2, which is full of new English words and phrases, catchy English songs, dance, and fun.
response.title: Angličanina 2
